item.title: Added browser based hardware emulation section.
item.description:
https://bellard.org/jslinux - a really fast x86 virtual machine capable of running Linux and Windows 2k.
https://bellard.org/jslinux - a OpenRISC virtual machine capable of running Linux with network support.
https://copy.sh/v86 - a x86 virtual machine capable of running Linux and other OS directly into the browser.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description:
https://etf-data.com/ - API](https://etf-data.com/) - Quality European ETF, ETN and ETC data, updated daily. The API offers complete overview including sector, country, factor, dividend yield and valuations. Additionally basic information such as domicile, followed index, asset class, fee, currency, replication method, distribution type and frequency. 50 free API calls per day.
https://vattly.com/ - Highly available, fast and secure VAT validation API, that provides full European Union coverage. 10 free API calls per day.

item.title: Added DronaHQ in paas
item.description: https://www.dronahq.com/ - No code application development platform for enterprises to visually develop application, integrate with existing systems to Build internal apps, processes and forms, rapidly. Free plan offers 200 Tasks/month, Unlimited Draft Apps and 1 Published Apps

item.title: fixed typo cluser instead of cluster
